text: Wahi hai jisne aasman o zameen ko barhaqq paida kiya hai aur jis din woh kahega ke hashar (resurrection) ho jaye usi din woh ho jayega. Uska irshad ain-e-haqq hai aur jis roz soor phoonka jayega us roz baadshahi usi ki hogi, woh gaib aur shahadat (visible) har cheez ka aleem hai aur dana aur bakhabar hai
